title: Clinical Trial Enrollment Form

fields.name: consentAgreement
fields.label: Informed Consent Agreement
fields.placeholder: Read the consent agreement carefully and confirm below.

fields.name: consentConfirmation
fields.label: I have read and understood the informed consent agreement.

fields.name: eligibilityQuestion1
fields.label: Do you have a history of cardiovascular disease?

fields.name: eligibilityQuestion2
fields.label: Are you currently taking any medications?

fields.name: medicationList
fields.label: List of Medications (if applicable)
fields.placeholder: List all medications you are currently taking.

fields.name: eligibilityQuestion3
fields.label: Have you participated in any clinical trials in the past year?

fields.name: trialDetails
fields.label: Details of Previous Trials (if applicable)
fields.placeholder: Provide details of any clinical trials you have participated in.

prompt: Make a clinical trial enrollment form with consent sections and eligibility questions
